divs: Sighting DetailsRegarding submitted date of 2010-02-17 and event date 2009-11-00 - smoke & mirrors cigar type craft - having studied the UFO phenomena for 50 years- to best view this object use no more than 7x binoculars to hold subject still while viewing - other options are Canons line of image stabilized binoculars, a high quality spotter scope on tripod, APO refractor telescope with wide field of view eyepiece. Quality of lenses with coatings more important than magnification. BEST OF LUCK +++
